extendedInfo.description: Created by the Calvin Alumni Association for Calvin College alumni, "Crib Sheet" is your way to stay current with campus news, sports highlights, alumni events and benefits and much more. The app is also your "real world" crib sheet on topics like money, housing, etiquette, health insurance and others.

reviews.title: Parent & Alum
reviews.comment: This is a great way to keep in touch as both an alum and as a parent of a current student. The latest update adds even more great information.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: cute app
reviews.comment: Love this app\'s attitude, light hearted but informative.
reviews.author: Keith Whitehouse

reviews.title: Neat little app
reviews.comment: The news feed section is great. As an alumnus who never actively searched for Calvin updates, it keeps me in touch with things that I wouldn\'t hear about otherwise.   The only issue I\'ve noticed is the share via email link seems to be broken. It takes me to my Gmail inbox, but doesn\'t open a new email with the article I want to share. The feedback email link does the same thing, so I was unable to alert the developers directly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This app blows
reviews.comment: It\'s basically a wrapper for Calvin\'s social network feeds. If I wanted that I could follow or like them myself.
reviews.author: A Google User
